XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`DMLTYPE$$`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“
then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“| |totalBlockTime|`xcrew.DAILY_ACCOUNT da`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`|`da.FLIGHT_TIME`, `da.TLC`, `da.DATE_`,
`d.TLC`, `d.BEGIN_DATE`, `d.END_DATE`|when `da.TLC` = `d.TLC` and `da.DATE_` >= `d.BEGIN_DATE` and `da.DATE_` <= `d.END_DATE`
then sum(`da.FLIGHT_TIME`)| |totalDutyTime|`xcrew.DAILY_ACCOUNT da`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`|`da.DUTY_TIME`, `da.TLC`, `da.DATE_`,
`d.TLC`, `d.BEGIN_DATE`, `d.END_DATE`|when `da.TLC` = `d.TLC` and `da.DATE_` >= `d.BEGIN_DATE` and `da.DATE_` <= `d.END_DATE`
then sum(`da.DUTY_TIME`)| |numberOfActivities|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`,
`XCREW.CHAIN_DAILY c`, `xcrew.CHAIN_ITEM_DAILY cid`,
`xcrew.ITEM_DAILY id`|`d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`, `c.uno`, `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`,
`cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO`, `id.UNO`, `id.TIME_STAMP`|when `d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = `c.uno` and `c.uno` = `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO` = `id.UNO`
then count(`id.TIME_STAMP`)| |numberOfLandings|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`,
`XCREW.CHAIN_DAILY c`, `xcrew.CHAIN_ITEM_DAILY cid`,
`xcrew.ITEM_DAILY id`|`d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`, `c.uno`, `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`,
`cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO`, `id.UNO`, `id.TIME_STAMP`|when `d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = `c.uno` and `c.uno` = `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO` = `id.UNO` and `id.TYPE` = "L"
then count(`id.TIME_STAMP`)| |dutyTimeLimit| | |N/A in the source system.| |illegalityDateLimit| | |N/A in the source system.| # Crew Activity Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Tracking Duty:** :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval **Tracking Duty Item:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Source Query **Tracking Duty:** :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval **Tracking Duty Item:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** * **Tracking Duty:** :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval * **Tracking Duty Item:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval **Steps:**
